name: Bomberman Kart
description:
Bomberman Kart is an action game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Bomberman Kart on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Toshinori Oyama. It was directed by Hideki Yayama, Takeshi Murata and Yasuyuki Kido. It was scored by Isao Kasai, Kenji Tani, Makoto Suehiro and Satoshi Iwasaki.
